definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain
hawsehole (small hole for anchor cable or hawser in the side of ship)

sentences.english: This application calls for a much larger Hawse pipe valve.
sentences.chinese: 这个应用就要求更大的锚链管道阀门。

sentences.english: My anchor's cable is not tarred.
sentences.chinese: 我的锚链是不涂焦油的。

sentences.english: The plates around the anchor chain bell mouth and rudder horn shall be strengthened.
sentences.chinese: 在锚链筒及挂舵臂的外板厚度应予以加强。

sentences.english: A man pulls up an anchor line in Al Aqabah Harbor, Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 在约旦亚喀巴港，一个渔人拉起一根锚链。

sentences.english: Design to grant easy stowing of anchor and smooth operation on deck.
sentences.chinese: 设计应保证锚易于放置和锚链在甲板上光滑运行。

sentences.english: Cable round the bow up and down.
Furthermore, the chain stopper of the mooring system is another essential design consideration.
sentences.chinese: 其中，锚链挚链器是系泊系统中的一个重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Block up hawsehole to prevent water flooding in chain locker.
sentences.chinese: 锚链管盖好，防止海水灌进链舱。

sentences.english: The chain runs well in the hawse pipe.
sentences.chinese: 锚链在锚链筒运行良好。

sentences.english: The chain runs well in the hawse pipe.
sentences.chinese: 锚链在锚链筒运行良好。

sentences.english: The anchor chain was spooling off.
Bay Bow Anchor, 1290 kGs, stockless type.
sentences.chinese: 求购锚链，1290公斤，无锚杆的类型。

sentences.english: The chain has fallen foul of some plants in the water.
sentences.chinese: 锚链与水中的一些植物缠在一起了。

sentences.english: Stand-by engine and shorten chain to 2 shackles for pilot embarkation.
sentences.chinese: 由于引航员登船，备车锚链缩短至2节。

sentences.english: Gate roller type chain stopper to be provided for each chain.
sentences.chinese: 每个锚链提供闸刀式止链器。

sentences.english: The rope fouled the anchor chain.
